entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:23 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Earlton

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -2.8°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
